reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She explains complex concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! Makes programming fun and accessible. Always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes rushes through material. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Assignments are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Excellent at breaking down complex theories. Lab sessions are well-organized.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Lectures can be dry. Grading is inconsistent and feedback is limited.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful analysis of texts. Encourages class discussions effectively.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be intimidating. Exams are very difficult.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer who relates theories to current events. Very approachable.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex math concepts. Homework is challenging but helpful.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Field trips to museums enhance learning.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting course content but lectures can be disorganized.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Brings real-world examples into class. Group projects are well-designed.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures. Encourages critical thinking and debate.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Seems disinterested in teaching. Relies too heavily on textbook material.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Practical approach to teaching. Lab work is particularly valuable.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Extremely knowledgeable and approachable. Makes a complex subject accessible.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Knows the subject well but can be impatient with slower learners.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating lectures with lots of real-world examples. Fair grader.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Explains concepts clearly but assignments can be overly difficult.
